ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The primary motivation of this package is to take the things that are great about the R packages 'flextable' <https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable/> and 'officer' <https://davidgohel.github.io/officer/>, take the standard and complex pieces of formatting clinical tables for regulatory use, and simplify the tedious pieces.

The primary motivation of this package is to take the things that are great about the R packages 'flextable' <https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable/> and 'officer' <https://davidgohel.github.io/officer/>, take the standard and complex pieces of formatting clinical tables for regulatory use, and simplify the tedious pieces.

name: r-clinify
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-clinify
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/clinify_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/clinify/clinify_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9e5163dedd59bbe2e79c4b9d4f5683e314cc5b73315809d7dc9280ab567576bb

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    # The libstdc++.dll provided in libstdcxx v15.1.0 build h904f734_2
    # is missing `_ZSt21ios_base_library_initv`.
    # see: conda-forge/ctng-compilers-feedstock#174
    - libstdcxx !=14.3.0,!=15.1.0  # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-flextable
    - r-htmltools
    - r-knitr
    - r-magrittr
    - r-officer >=0.6.9
    - r-tidyselect
    - r-zoo
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-flextable
    - r-htmltools
    - r-knitr
    - r-magrittr
    - r-officer >=0.6.9
    - r-tidyselect
    - r-zoo
  run_constrained:
    - libstdcxx !=14.3.0,!=15.1.0           # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('clinify')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('clinify')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://atorus-research.github.io/clinify/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: The primary motivation of this package is to take the things that are great about the R packages 'flextable' <https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable/> and 'officer' <https://davidgohel.github.io/officer/>, take the standard and complex pieces of formatting clinical tables for regulatory use, and simplify the tedious
    pieces.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file:
    - LICENSE-2.0.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
